About Coalescence

Our "Mini festo": Hello again

We've created an outdoor experience unlike any other.

Coalescence is a "choose your own adventure" style campout that is focused on disconnecting from technology and our daily lives so we can reconnect with ourselves, each other and nature.

This camp out is for the curious beginner and the experienced outdoors person alike.

Everyone has a chance to participate as much or as little as they want in activities put on by our teachers, sponsors, partners and other Coalescees.

See our list of curated activities here.

Back at camp, enjoy music and art as we intertwine the two to create an intimate and immersive experience.

This camp out is for the curious beginner and the experienced outdoors person. Everyone has a chance to participate as much or as little as they want in activities put on by our teachers, sponsors, partners and Coalescees. See a list of activities here. Enjoy music and the arts as we intertwine the two to create a more intimate experience.

We believe that radical contribution enhances everyone's experience, and ask that every Coalescee contribute in some shape or form.

We've had people volunteer to lead activities, throw camp parties, showcase their talents, and assist with essentials like picking up trash.

How can you and your camp add value to everyone’s weekend?

Coalescence believes in being stewards of the planet that makes these experiences possible, and strongly promotes simple conservation principles.

We strive to perfect the art of the R’s – Refuse, Reduce, Reuse, Repair, Repurpose, Recycle – and ask that you do your part to "leave no trace".

Practicing these concepts helps ensure that our environment and finite natural resources are preserved for future appreciation and use.

Join us June 11-13, 2021.

Reserve your spot today and be one of the few founding Coalescees.
